allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(plan\): implement CLI-mode requirement gathering with inquire prompts

Add CliGatherer for direct user interaction in CLI mode, implementing
the gather phase per design decision [D18]. The CLI now acts as the
interviewer, collecting requirements without agent involvement.

Key additions:
- GatherResult struct with requirements string and user confirmation
- Scope enum \(Full/Minimal/Custom\) for new idea scope selection
- Gathering workflow for new ideas: scope, tests, summary confirmation
- Gathering workflow for revisions: plan summary, change description
- PlanningLoop branches on PlanningMode in run_interviewer_gather\(\)

Tests: 263 passed \(13 new\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for skill in clarifier critic reviewer auditor)
